issue.title: [CF 96] Latest Version doesn't show some buff
issue.body:
ATTACHING A SAVED VARIABLES FILE/SCREENSHOT WILL GET YOUR TICKET ANSWERED 10 TIMES FASTER

Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<ACOOUNTNAME>/<REALMNAME>/<CHARNAME>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

Tmw is not able to show some buff of frost mage.
In example I am not able to show Fingers of Frost (spell id: 44543;44545;83074; ) and Brain Freeze  (spell id: 44546;44548;44549; ).

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.
2.
3.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

The expected output should be an icon with a timer. But It is not show up. Other spells proc instead work as intended.

What version of the product are you using?

V.3.0.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user gmarco | Imported from CurseForge issue #96 | Raw

comments.body:
Deinstall and reinstall (with deleting also the config file) solve the problem and now everything appears again. :-)

The only thing is I have to reconfigure it for every pg on 2 accounts :-)

Btw thanks again for the great addon.


> Posted by CurseForge user gmarco
